atrules.name: @nest
atrules.prose: To address all of these issue, the @nest rule is defined:

selectors.prose: When using a nested style rule, one must be able to refer to the elements matched by the parent rule; that is, after all, the entire point of nesting. To accomplish that, this specification defines a new selector, the nesting selector, written as & (U+0026 AMPERSAND).
